00028 @implementation RSBarcodeViewController
00029 
00030 @synthesize xWidth = _xWidth;
00031 @synthesize datamoduleCount = _datamoduleCount;
00032 @synthesize nondatamoduleCount = _nondatamoduleCount;
00033 @synthesize totalmoduleCount = _totalmoduleCount;
00034 @synthesize dataString = _dataString;
00035 @synthesize theView = _theView;
00036 
00037 - (id)initWithType:( enum kRSBarcode ) BC andData:(NSString *)barcodeData atPosition:(NSRect)rect
00038 {
00039         //**call to superclass init**
00040     self = [super initWithNibName:nil bundle:nil];
00041     if (self)
00042         {
00043                 [self setDataString:barcodeData];
00044                 _theView = [[NSView alloc] initWithFrame:rect];
00045                 [self setView:_theView];
00046     }
00047         
00048         
00049         //**create the correct subtype**
00050         string *cplusplus_datastring = new string( [_dataString cStringUsingEncoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding] );
00051         switch ( BC ) 
00052         {
00053                 case kRSCodabar:
00054                         barcode = new Codabar( cplusplus_datastring );
00055                         break;
00056                 case kRSCode39:
00057                         barcode = new Code39( cplusplus_datastring );
00058                         break;
00059                 case kRSInterleaved:
00060                         barcode = new Interleaved2of5( cplusplus_datastring );
00061                         break;
00062                 case kRSCode128:
00063                         barcode = new Code128( cplusplus_datastring );
00064                         break;
00065                 case kRSEAN13:
00066                         barcode = new EAN13( cplusplus_datastring );
00067                         break;
00068                 case kRSEAN8:
00069                         barcode = new EAN8( cplusplus_datastring );
00070                         break;
00071                 case kRSUPCA:
00072                         barcode = new UPCA( cplusplus_datastring );
00073                         break;
00074                 case kRSUPCE:
00075                         barcode = new UPCE( cplusplus_datastring );
00076                         break;
00077                 default:
00078                         break;
00079         }
00080         
00081         
00082         deque< Symbol* > testDeque = barcode->getEncodedSymbols( );
00083         NSMutableArray *modulesPerSymbol = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00084         int nondata_accumulator = 0, data_accumulator = 0, icgap = 0, local_accum = 0;
00085         for ( int gg = 0; gg < testDeque.size( ); gg++ ) 
00086         {
00087                 vector< int > *pattern;
00088                 pattern = testDeque.at( gg )->getEncodedData( );
00089                 switch ( testDeque.at( gg )->getSymbolType( ) ) 
00090                 {
00091                         case 0: //add up all the element widths for data
00092                                 icgap = testDeque.at( gg )->getIntercharGap( );
00093                                 data_accumulator += icgap;
00094                                 local_accum = 0;
00095                                 for ( int hh = 0; hh < pattern->size( ); hh++ ) 
00096                                 {
00097                                         int result = pattern->at( hh );
00098                                         local_accum += result;
00099                                         data_accumulator = data_accumulator + result;
00100                                 }
00101                                 [modulesPerSymbol addObject:[NSNumber numberWithInt:local_accum]];
00102                                 break;
00103                         case 1:
00104                         case 2:
00105                         case 3:
00106                         case 4:
00107                         case 5: //add up all the element widths for nondata
00108                                 icgap = testDeque.at( gg )->getIntercharGap( );
00109                                 nondata_accumulator += icgap;
00110                                 local_accum = 0;
00111                                 for ( int hh = 0; hh < pattern->size( ); hh++ ) 
00112                                 {
00113                                         int result = pattern->at( hh );
00114                                         local_accum += result;
00115                                         nondata_accumulator += result;
00116                                 }
00117                                 [modulesPerSymbol addObject:[NSNumber numberWithInt:local_accum]];
00118                                 break;
00119                         default:
00120                                 break;
00121                 }
00122                 
00123         }
00124         
00125         CGFloat selfwidth = self.view.frame.size.width;
00126         int totalModules = ( data_accumulator + nondata_accumulator );
00127         [self setDatamoduleCount:data_accumulator];
00128         [self setNondatamoduleCount:nondata_accumulator];
00129         [self setTotalmoduleCount:totalModules];
00130         CGFloat findX = selfwidth / totalModules;
00131         self.xWidth = findX;
00132         
00133         //create an RSSymbol for each Symbol
00134         NSPoint insertionPoint = NSMakePoint( 0, 0);
00135         for ( int ii = 0; ii < testDeque.size( ); ii++ ) 
00136         {       
00137                 //Work out the width for each one, loop through vector
00138                 NSMutableArray *symbolPattern = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00139                 CGFloat width_accum = 0;
00140                 for ( int jj = 0; jj < testDeque.at( ii )->getEncodedData( )->size( ); jj++ ) 
00141                 {
00142                         width_accum += testDeque.at( ii )->getEncodedData( )->at( jj );
00143                         [symbolPattern addObject:[NSNumber numberWithInt:testDeque.at( ii )->getEncodedData( )->at( jj )]];
00144                 }
00145                 width_accum += testDeque.at( ii )->getIntercharGap( );
00146                 
00147                 kRSStarter se;
00148                 switch ( testDeque.at( ii )->getLeadingElement( ) ) 
00149                 {
00150                         case 0:
00151                                 se = kRSSpace;
00152                                 break;
00153                         case 1:
00154                                 se = kRSBar;
00155                         default:
00156                                 break;
00157                 }
00158                 
00159                 kRSType type;
00160                 switch ( testDeque.at( ii )->getSymbolType( ) ) 
00161                 {
00162                         case 0:
00163                                 type = kRSData;
00164                                 break;
00165                         case 1:
00166                                 type = kRSCheckChar;
00167                                 break;
00168                         case 2:
00169                                 type = kRSQuietZone;
00170                                 break;
00171                         case 3:
00172                                 type = kRSGuardPattern;
00173                                 break;
00174                         case 4:
00175                                 type = kRSStartStop;
00176                                 break;
00177                         case 5:
00178                                 type= kRSNonData;
00179                                 break;
00180                         default:
00181                                 break;
00182                 }
00183                 
00184                 CGFloat newY, newHeight;
00185                 if ( ( BC == kRSEAN13 || BC == kRSEAN8 || BC == kRSUPCA || BC == kRSUPCE || BC == kRSInterleaved ) && ( type == kRSData || type == kRSCheckChar || type == kRSQuietZone ) ) //The human readable ones...
00186                 {
00187                         newY = self.view.frame.size.height * 0.15;
00188                         newHeight = self.view.frame.size.height *0.85;
00189                         [self humanReadableText: BC];
00190                 } 
00191                 else 
00192                 {       
00193                         newY = 0;
00194                         newHeight = self.view.frame.size.height;
00195                 }
00196                 
00197                 //create an RSSymbol for each Symbol
00198                 RSSymbol *aSymbol = [[RSSymbol alloc] initWithFrame:NSMakeRect( insertionPoint.x, newY, width_accum * _xWidth, newHeight ) andData:[NSArray arrayWithArray:symbolPattern] startingWith:se andX:_xWidth ofType:type];
00199                 
00200                 //Add them into self.view
00201                 [self.view addSubview:aSymbol];
00202                 //increment insertionPoint by symbol width
00203                 insertionPoint.x += width_accum * _xWidth;
00204                 
00205                 //NSLog( @"%@ ", symbolPattern );
00206                 
00207                 symbolPattern = nil;
00208                 [symbolPattern release];
00209         }
00210         
00211         
00212     delete cplusplus_datastring;
00213     return self;
00214 }
00215 
00216 - (void) humanReadableText:( enum kRSBarcode ) BC
00217 {
00218         CGFloat localWidth = self.view.frame.size.width;
00219         CGFloat localHeight = self.view.frame.size.height;
00220         
00221         NSString *contentString = [NSString stringWithCString:barcode->completedDataString.c_str( ) encoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding];
00222         
00223         NSTextView *labelOne = [[NSTextView alloc] init];
00224         NSTextView *labelTwo = [[NSTextView alloc] init];
00225         NSTextView *labelThree = [[NSTextView alloc] init];
00226         NSTextView *labelFour = [[NSTextView alloc] init];
00227         
00228         [labelOne setBackgroundColor:[NSColor clearColor]];
00229         [labelOne setAlignment:NSCenterTextAlignment];
00230         [labelOne setEditable:NO];
00231         
00232         [labelTwo setBackgroundColor:[NSColor clearColor]];
00233         [labelTwo setAlignment:NSCenterTextAlignment];
00234         [labelTwo setEditable:NO];
00235         
00236         [labelThree setBackgroundColor:[NSColor clearColor]];
00237         [labelThree setAlignment:NSCenterTextAlignment];
00238         [labelThree setEditable:NO];
00239         
00240         [labelFour setBackgroundColor:[NSColor clearColor]];
00241         [labelFour setAlignment:NSCenterTextAlignment];
00242         [labelFour setEditable:NO];
00243         
00244         switch ( BC ) 
00245         {
00246                 case kRSEAN13:
00247                         [labelOne setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 1)]];
00248                         [labelOne setFrame:NSMakeRect( 0, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.08, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00249                         [labelOne setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00250                         [labelOne setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00251                         [self.view addSubview:labelOne];
00252                         
00253                         [labelTwo setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 6)]];
00254                         [labelTwo setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.13, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.35, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00255                         [labelTwo setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00256                         [labelTwo setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00257                         [self.view addSubview:labelTwo];
00258                         
00259                         [labelThree setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(6, 6)]];
00260                         [labelThree setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.53, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.35, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00261                         [labelThree setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00262                         [labelThree setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00263                         [self.view addSubview:labelThree];
00264                         
00265                         [labelFour setString:[ contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(12, 1)]];
00266                         [labelFour setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.91, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.1, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00267                         [labelFour setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00268                         [labelFour setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00269                         [self.view addSubview:labelFour];
00270                         break;
00271                 case kRSEAN8:
00272                         [labelOne setString:@"<"];
00273                         [labelOne setFrame:NSMakeRect( 0, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.08, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00274                         [labelOne setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00275                         [labelOne setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00276                         [self.view addSubview:labelOne];
00277                         
00278                         [labelTwo setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 4)]];
00279                         [labelTwo setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.13, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.33, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00280                         [labelTwo setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00281                         [labelTwo setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00282                         [self.view addSubview:labelTwo];
00283                         
00284                         [labelThree setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(4, 4)]];
00285                         [labelThree setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.53, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.33, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00286                         [labelThree setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00287                         [labelThree setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00288                         [self.view addSubview:labelThree];
00289                         
00290                         [labelFour setString:@">"];
00291                         [labelFour setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.91, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.1, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00292                         [labelFour setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00293                         [labelFour setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00294                         [self.view addSubview:labelFour];
00295                         break;
00296                 case kRSUPCA:
00297                         [labelOne setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 1)]];
00298                         [labelOne setFrame:NSMakeRect( 0, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.08, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00299                         [labelOne setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00300                         [labelOne setNeedsDisplay:YES];

00302                         
00303                         [labelTwo setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(1, 5)]];
00304                         [labelTwo setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.13, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.35, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00305                         [labelTwo setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00306                         [labelTwo setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00307                         [self.view addSubview:labelTwo];
00308                         
00309                         [labelThree setString:[contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(6, 5)]];
00310                         [labelThree setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.53, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.35, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00311                         [labelThree setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00312                         [labelThree setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00313                         [self.view addSubview:labelThree];
00314                         
00315                         [labelFour setString:[ contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(11, 1)]];
00316                         [labelFour setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.91, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.1, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00317                         [labelFour setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00318                         [labelFour setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00319                         [self.view addSubview:labelFour];
00320                         break;
00321                 case kRSUPCE:
00322                         [labelOne setString:@"0"];
00323                         [labelOne setFrame:NSMakeRect( 0, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.08, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00324                         [labelOne setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00325                         [labelOne setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00326                         [self.view addSubview:labelOne];
00327                         
00328                         [labelTwo setString:[ contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 6)]];
00329                         [labelTwo setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.13, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.7, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00330                         [labelTwo setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00331                         [labelTwo setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00332                         [self.view addSubview:labelTwo];
00333                         
00334                         [labelFour setString:[ contentString substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(6, 1)]];
00335                         [labelFour setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.91, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.1, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00336                         [labelFour setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00337                         [labelFour setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00338                         [self.view addSubview:labelFour];
00339                         break;
00340                 case kRSInterleaved:
00341                         [labelTwo setString:contentString];
00342                         [labelTwo setFrame:NSMakeRect( localWidth * 0.13, -(localHeight * 0.05), localWidth * 0.7, localHeight * 0.15 )];
00343                         [labelTwo setFont:[NSFont fontWithName:@"OCRB" size:localHeight * 0.13]];
00344                         [labelTwo setNeedsDisplay:YES];
